name: MOONWORLD: Arcade Mode
description:
*~100MB*

controls:

WASD to move

Space to Jump

Left Shift to Sprint

Q to zoom camera

 Left Click or E to shoot grapple

(keep an eye on the crosshair, it highlights when you are within range of an object)

(keep an eye on the grapple hook, so you know if the line is out / retracted)

this is a more performant republication of MOONWORLD with a few changes. players move faster, jump further & can sprint. the starting area and introduction is cut so players can jump straight into the action.

the goal is simple: grapple & swing to the top of the map. but its not easy. the whole map is a big puzzle and I don't even know how to get to the top most of the time.

talk to this star.

you won't get very far without a mouse & keyboard. track-pad gamers beware!

i made MOONWORLD: Arcade Mode because i wanted to see the fastest ways players can get to the top. the map is wild, so get a good line down and keep pushing until you get a good time. post your results in the comments. first person to get a 1:12 is a winner

MOONWORLD was commissioned by Tour de Moon, as part of UNBOXED: Creativity in the UK

Produced in collaboration with Gabrielle De Puente
